structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Complaint Of Threat To Commit Crime
law.text: If complaint is made to any such court or justice that a person has threatened to commit a crime against the person or property of another, such court or justice shall examine the complainant and any witnesses who may be produced, on oath, reduce the complaint to writing and cause it to be subscribed by the complainant.
